top_stories.title: Senate Republicans deepfaked Chuck Schumer, and X hasn’t taken it down
top_stories.description: The video was posted Friday on the Senate Republicans' X account. According to X’s policies, the platform prohibits “deceptively shar[ing] synthetic or manipulated media that are likely to cause harm.” Harmful content includes media that could “mislead people” or “cause significant confusion on public issues.”
top_stories.author: Rebecca Bellan
top_stories.content: The video was posted Friday on the Senate Republicans' X account. According to X’s policies, the platform prohibits “deceptively shar[ing] synthetic or manipulated media that are likely to cause harm.” Harmful content includes media that could “mislead people” or “cause significant confusion on public issues.”

top_stories.title: Transforming enterprise operations: Four high-impact use cases with Amazon Nova
top_stories.description: In this post, we share four high-impact, widely adopted use cases built with Nova in Amazon Bedrock, supported by real-world customers deployments, offerings available from AWS partners, and experiences. These examples are ideal for organizations researching their own AI adoption strategies and use cases across industries.
top_stories.author: Abhinav Bhargava
top_stories.content: In this post, we share four high-impact, widely adopted use cases built with Nova in Amazon Bedrock, supported by real-world customers deployments, offerings available from AWS partners, and experiences. top_stories.title: How Starcloud Is Bringing Data Centers to Outer Space
top_stories.description: The NVIDIA Inception startup projects that space-based data centers will offer 10x lower energy costs and reduce the need for energy consumption on Earth.
top_stories.author: Angie Lee
top_stories.content: The NVIDIA Inception startup projects that space-based data centers will offer 10x lower energy costs and reduce the need for energy consumption on Earth.

top_stories.title: These 7 Indian Voice AI Startups are Getting Loud
top_stories.description: India’s voice and speech AI ecosystem is undergoing a powerful evolution, driven by a new generation of startups building multilingual, culturally attuned and enterprise-grade conversational systems. From generative AI models that speak in dozens of Indian languages, voice agents redefining call centres and TTS engines fine-tuned for regional accents, these companies are quietly laying the […] The post These 7 Indian Voice AI Startups are Getting Loud appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.

top_stories.title: How AI-Powered Wireless Networks Will Revitalize US Global Leadership in Communications
top_stories.description: Telecommunication networks are critical infrastructure for every nation, underpinning the global flow of communications and data across billions of smartphones and connected devices. The next generation of these networks, known as 6G, will for the first time be built to support AI traffic — and can be powered by AI from the ground up. The Read Article
top_stories.author: Kanika Atri
